titles.title: Providing for corrections in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 5164) amending title 49, United States Code, to require reports concerning defects in motor vehicles or tires or other motor vehicle equipment in foreign countries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Mr. Upton asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/12/2000--Introduced. Provides for corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 5164 (mandatory reports on foreign motor vehicle equipment or tire defects).
